QUESTION.FULL_NAME: Full name as it appears on your drivers license
QUESTION.DRIVER_LICENSE_8_YEARS: Have you possessed an unrestricted full drivers license for 8 years or more?
QUESTION.FAULT_ACCIDENT_6_YEARS: Have you had MORE than 2 at fault accidents in past 6 years?
QUESTION.MINOR_DRIVING_CONVICTION_3_YEARS: Have you had MORE than 3 minor driving convictions in the past 3 years?
QUESTION.MINOR_DRIVING_CONVICTION_3_YEARS_DESCRIP: HELP: Examples include speeding, red light, etc.
QUESTION.HAVE_INSURANCE_POLICY: Do you have a personal automobile insurance policy?
QUESTION.INSURANCE_PROVIDER: Who is your current insurance provider?
QUESTION.CRIMINAL_DRIVING_OFFENCE_3_YEARS: Have you been convicted of a criminal code driving offense in the past 3 years?
QUESTION.NO_AUTOMOBILE_CANCELLATION_3_YEARS: Has your personal automobile insurance been cancelled in the past 3 years?
QUESTION.CONFIRM_DESCRIPTION: If any changes occur to my license status prior to RV rental I agree to inform RVezy at hello@RVezy.com. Changes include claims, charges, or convictions on your driver's license.
